function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Employees returning to the workplace without proper training on new work and cleaning procedures.","Impact":"Risk of inadequate sanitation leading to increased risk of contagious diseases spreading.","Mitigation":"Provide comprehensive training on new procedures and cleaning protocols to all employees.","Technologies":"Online training platforms, virtual reality simulations for practical training.","People":"All employees returning to work.","Owner":"Management and training department."},{"Description":"Working in pairs or groups without proper precautions and prevention measures.","Impact":"Increased risk of contagion due to close proximity and shared tasks.","Mitigation":"Implement strict guidelines for working in pairs or groups, provide necessary protective equipment, and enforce social distancing protocols.","Technologies":"Scheduling software for staggered work shifts, contact tracing apps for monitoring potential exposure.","People":"All employees, especially those working in close proximity.","Owner":"Management and HR department."},{"Description":"Lack of dedicated resources to manage prevention measures and ensure compliance.","Impact":"Increased risk of oversight and non-compliance with safety protocols, leading to higher contagion risk.","Mitigation":"Appoint dedicated personnel, such as a Manager, Resort Doctor, and Security Manager, to oversee and enforce prevention measures.","Technologies":"Communication apps for reporting and monitoring, surveillance cameras for compliance monitoring.","People":"Appointed personnel responsible for prevention measures.","Owner":"Management and relevant department heads."}]}
